attributes.action: Stop the BBC's biased reporting of the conflict in Gaza
attributes.additional_details:
The BBC News front page carried the headline 'Israel under renewed Hamas attack'.

We do condemn Hamas' use of rockets as well as the murder of three Israeli teenagers but the BBC's headline fails to outline that Israel's retaliatory attacks have killed innocent children.

Since 2009, twenty times more Palestinians have died in the conflict than Israelis yet the BBC still seems to have an agenda.

This is dangerous and must stop.
